manifest.name: Team Player Pack

manifest.description: Quests for practicing team sports, showing good sportsmanship, and working together.

quests.title: Attend Practice
quests.description: Attend your team's scheduled practice session.

quests.title: Drill Master
quests.description: Spend 20 minutes practicing a specific skill for your sport.

quests.title: Game Day Ready
quests.description: Prepare your uniform and equipment for the upcoming game.

quests.title: Good Sport
quests.description: Show good sportsmanship by congratulating the other team, win or lose.

quests.title: Team Huddle
quests.description: Listen attentively to the coach during a game or practice.

quests.title: Clean Your Gear
quests.description: Clean your sports equipment after a game or practice.

markets.title: The Locker Room
markets.description: Sports equipment and fan gear for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Team Jersey
gameAssets.description: A customizable team jersey for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Soccer Ball
gameAssets.description: A classic soccer ball for your avatar to hold.

gameAssets.name: Gatorade
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: one sports drink.

trophies.name: Most Valuable Player
trophies.description: Awarded for outstanding performance in a game.
